com.gitblit

Class FileUserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gitblit.IStoredSettings
      • com.gitblit.FileSettings
        • com.gitblit.FileUserService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUserService
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class FileUserService
extends FileSettings
implements IUserService
    FileUserService is Gitblit's original default user service implementation. Users and their repository memberships are stored in a simple properties file which is cached and dynamically reloaded when modified. This class was deprecated in Gitblit 0.8.0 in favor of ConfigUserService which is still a human-readable, editable, plain-text file but it is more flexible for storing additional fields.
    Author:
    James Moger
